head.title: Restaurant Template | Fran Aragón
head.description: Professional restaurant website template by Fran Aragón. Built with React and TypeScript, it delivers an elegant, responsive, and visually appealing experience, showcasing menus, values, gallery, and contact information in an intuitive way.

cookies.message: We use analytical cookies to improve the user experience and analyze site traffic. We do not store personal data. You can accept or reject their use.

cookiesPolicy.title: Cookie Policy
cookiesPolicy.intro: This website uses analytical cookies to understand how users interact with the site, using tools such as Google Analytics and Search Console.
cookiesPolicy.whatAreCookies: Cookies are small files stored on your device to improve your experience on the website.
typesList: Analytical cookies: Allow us to collect anonymous data about site usage to improve performance and user experience.
cookiesPolicy.manageText: You can accept or reject analytical cookies via the banner or through your browser settings.
cookiesPolicy.personalDataTextPart1: We do not collect or store personal data through cookies or forms on this site.
cookiesPolicy.changesText: We may update this policy occasionally. Please review this page to stay informed.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: This website does not store personal user data. We only use external tools like Google Analytics and Search Console to analyze metrics and improve the experience.

sections.title: 1. Personal data
sections.text: We do not collect or store personal data through this website.

sections.title: 2. Analytical tools
sections.text: We use Google Analytics and Search Console to measure site traffic and behavior, always respecting user privacy through data anonymization.

sections.title: 3. Contact
sections.text: If you want to contact me, you can do so by email. We do not store your information or track you.

sections.title: 4. Rights
sections.text: Since we do not store personal data, requests for access, correction, or deletion do not apply.

sections.title: 5. Policy changes
sections.text: We may update this policy at any time. We recommend reviewing it periodically.

footer.slogan: A unique and high-quality gastronomic experience, from our kitchen to your table.

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.subtitle: Sorry, we couldn't find the page you're looking for.

contact.title: Contact
contact.name: Name
contact.error: There was an error sending the message

about-us.title: About Us
about-us.subtitle: Discover our story, values, and passion for gastronomy
about-us.story: Our restaurant was born from a passion for traditional cuisine and a commitment to our guests. From the very beginning, we aimed to offer a culinary experience that combines authentic recipes with a cozy atmosphere, making every visit a memorable moment.
about-us.journey: Over the years, we have grown thanks to the trust of our customers and the constant dedication of our team. Every dish tells a story, using the finest local ingredients and techniques that honor our culinary tradition.
about-us.mission: We offer fresh, high-quality dishes crafted with love in every recipe. Our mission is to make every guest feel special and enjoy attentive and friendly service.
about-us.vision: We strive to be a gastronomic reference in our city, combining innovation and tradition, creating a space where food and friendship come together.
about-us.qualityText: Only the finest ingredients and authentic recipes.
about-us.freshText: Local, seasonal products for the best flavor.
about-us.loveText: We cook with passion so you can enjoy every bite.
about-us.communityText: We support local producers and participate in initiatives that strengthen our community.
about-us.sustainabilityText: We prioritize responsible practices to protect the environment and the future of gastronomy.
about-us.innovationText: We strive to surprise with new flavors and techniques, always maintaining our essence.
about-us.philosophyText: We believe that dining is more than nourishment: it’s an experience that brings people together, celebrates tradition, and awakens the senses. Every dish we serve reflects our passion, dedication, and respect for ingredients.

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.subtitle: Explore our restaurant, dishes, and special moments through our images

home.aboutSubtitle: Discover our story and passion for gastronomy
home.aboutText1: At our restaurant we combine tradition and modernity, offering dishes made with top-quality ingredients.
home.aboutText2: Our team works with dedication to provide unique culinary experiences, paying attention to every detail.
home.valuesSubtitle: Principles that guide our cuisine and customer care
home.qualityText: We select only the finest ingredients for every dish.
home.freshText: Our products are fresh and seasonal, ensuring flavor and health.
home.loveText: We cook with dedication and love in every detail.
home.communityText: We support local producers and foster connections with our customers.
home.sustainabilityText: Committed to responsible and eco-friendly practices.
home.innovationText: Always seeking new ways to surprise our diners.
home.gallerySubtitle: A glimpse at our dishes, events, and spaces
home.menuItem1Desc: Creamy rice with fresh seafood and a touch of saffron.
home.menuItem2Desc: Fresh and healthy with local vegetables and extra virgin olive oil.
home.contactSubtitle: Book your table or ask us a question
